title: Holidays in the axis of evil BBC 4 documentary
description:
\"The Bush regime claims that North Korea, Iraq, Iran, Syria, Libya and Cuba are part of an \"axis of evil\".
In a remarkable two-part travelogue, reporter Ben Anderson, armed with a hidden camera and a tourist
map, visits all six rogue states and tries to find the reality of life in some of the most repressive regimes
in the world.\"
 <a href="
http://www.bbc.co.uk/bbcfour/documentaries/features/axis.shtml" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.bbc.co.uk/bbcfour/documentaries/features/axis.shtml</a>
 <a href="
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Axis_of_Evil" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Axis_of_Evil</a>
 <a href="
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Holidays_in_the_Axis_of_Evil" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Holidays_in_the_Axis_of_Evil</a>

This documentary was uploaded on a private tracker, but split up
in two. The original torrent missed the first 35 minutes of part 1, which
was later uploaded by someone else.

The quality is ok but not at all great. The missing opening is ripped from VHS,
but it is ok to watch, especially since there are no other sources out there.
